name: Wumpo Botan

aura.name: guardian_of_the_grassy_fields
aura.description: Can be ridden. While in team, Wumpo Botan helps carry supplies, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

description: researchers once tried to cut the grass off its body to reveal its true form. In the end, only grass was left, as if that was all there was to begin with.

skills.name: wind_cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: aqua_gun
skills.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

skills.name: seed_mine
skills.description: Launches a deadly seed. If it hits an enemy, the seed explodes.

skills.name: grass_tornado
skills.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: spine_vine
skills.description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

skills.name: aqua_burst
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: solar_blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
